Maybe you recently took a great interest in photographing wildlife ... or you are an experienced naturalist photographer who has traveled the whole planet along and across - probably there are questions - who did I photograph? ... how can I take a picture? Where to looking for? Our project will try to answer these questions and, last but not least, put new ones in front of you ... Our project will help not only to learn something new. You can also become part of this project and play the role of the author, if you have something to share (article, photo, review, note).
